ELEMENT.TITLE: Detailed Product List
ELEMENT.SUMMARY:
Contains two WIKI text boxes, one at the top and one at the bottom, plus a 550 by 110 pixel (5x1 aspect ratio) image near the top of the page.

The product list features a 150 x 150 pixel image on the left, with the product name, price, description to the left, with a more info and add to cart link below that. Wiki formatting will be stripped. This product list is NOT friendly towards HTML.

Subcategories on pages using this layout will be displayed in a three column format and will display the most recent set of subcategories if non are present for this category.
